meanings.definition: A title of respect for a male descendant of the Prophet Muhammad.
meanings.sent1: The Syed visited the mosque to lead the prayers.
meanings.sent2: Many people in the community respect the Syed for his knowledge.
meanings.sent3: When the Syed tripped over his own shoes, everyone chuckled.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom shone through his eyes, making him seem like a Syed of old tales.
meanings.sent5: The Syed's presence in the room was as calming as a gentle breeze on a hot day.

meanings.sent1: My friend's last name is Syed, just like many others in our community.
meanings.sent2: The Syed family has been living in this neighborhood for generations.
meanings.sent3: When Mr. Syed accidentally wore mismatched socks, it became the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The Syed surname spread across the region like wildfire, connecting families far and wide.
meanings.sent5: The Syed name carried a sense of honor and tradition wherever it went.
